snippet: His announcement came amid reports that the Fox network has decided to remove all of the show’s on-air judges and its executive producer.
abstract: Randy Jackson, longest-serving judge on television show American Idol, announces his intent to leave at end of season; news of his departure comes amid reports that Fox network has decided to remove all of show's on-air judges and its executive producer.
lead_paragraph: His announcement came amid reports that the Fox network has decided to remove all of the show’s on-air judges and its executive producer.
